issue.title: [C++/Python] CheckPyError() could inspect exception type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2390](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2390). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current `CheckPyError` always chooses an "unknown error" status. But it could inspect the Python exception and choose, e.g. "type error" for a `TypeError` exception, etc.

See also ARROW-2389
